creator: mario.teichmann.extern@icn.siemens.de
text:
I must use SHA auth for an application, because it is the only supported 
password auth, which generate the same auth string if the input string is equal.
So I need it to check the user auth in my application and also at apache 
webserver.
apache 1.3.27, which I use now works fine, but I want to make an update to 2.x
as soon as possible.
Can you inform me how to solve this problem?
Kind regards
  Mario

creator: jorton@redhat.com
